Server.Name: WinterProject A17
Server.Description:
Winter Project 2018 (latest_experimental) by sphereii and xyth Nuclear winter buried the apocalyptic remnants of civilization, sending survivors scattering across the world in the slim chance of their survival.
Prepare to battle the elements, see the world differently, and test your survival skills in the latest incarnation of the Winter Project, by sphereii and xyth.
Featuring UI modlets from Sirillion, Red Eagle LXIX and stedman420, Winter Project has been updated through xyth's tireless efforts in unity with redone creatures and items. While the Nightmares have vanished, other aspects of the original Winter Project remain.
Please enjoy our winter apocalypse, -sphereii and xyth
